comment:
* A table that stores settings specific to the browser. Only support query and insert.
     * @hide

variables.name: CONTENT_URI
variables.comment: * The content:// style URI for this table

variables.name: KEY_SYNC_ENABLED
variables.comment: * If set to non-0 the user has opted into bookmark sync.

methods.name: public static boolean isSyncEnabled(Context context)
methods.comment: * Returns true if bookmark sync is enabled

methods.name: public static void setSyncEnabled(Context context, boolean enabled)
methods.comment: * Sets the bookmark sync enabled setting.

methodNames: public static void setSyncEnabled(Context context, boolean enabled)
